first_hatch.title: First Hatch
first_hatch.long_description: Welcome to the world of dinosaurs! Create your account and start your prehistoric adventure.

periods_explorer.title: Periods Explorer
periods_explorer.long_description: Explore the different prehistoric periods and learn about how Earth and its inhabitants evolved through time.

galleries_explorer.title: Galleries Explorer
galleries_explorer.long_description: Discover the different galleries in our virtual museum and learn about different species of dinosaurs.

dynotective.title: Dynotective
dynotective.long_description: Become a dinosaur detective by analyzing and learning about different dinosaur species and their unique features.

fragment_hunter.title: Fragment Hunter
fragment_hunter.long_description: Search and collect puzzle pieces throughout your journey to complete dinosaur puzzles.

reader.title: Reader
reader.long_description: Expand your knowledge by reading books about dinosaurs and prehistoric life.

cerebrosaurus.title: Cerebrosaurus
cerebrosaurus.long_description: Put your brain to work by completing dinosaur puzzles and proving your problem-solving skills.

cerebrasauryn.title: Cerebrasauryn
cerebrasauryn.long_description: Test and improve your memory by making successful matches in the memory game.

cult_dino.title: Cult Dino
cult_dino.long_description: Achieve the ultimate recognition by earning all other achievements at their highest tier.
